title: Just place your bet on
body:
The winning team of the Worlds®

My guess / the team I'm betting on is the Fnatic team <3

replies.body: I'm betting on EDG to win worlds this season.
I want SK Telecom T1 to win worlds :3
$10 on the team with most Koreans
I would bet on LGD....but I wish C9 would do well.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZOalU7de,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-15T00:39:01.302+0000)
>
> I would bet on LGD....but I wish C9 would do well
I would love to see C9 do well too but IG and Fnatic is probably too much for them to handle because juggernauts are extremely powerful picks right now and IG's Zztai and Fnatic Huni are both really good at carry top laners. Fyi Zztai's fiora is a beast.

> [{quoted}](name=Zen Bot,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZOalU7de,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-09-15T05:56:32.444+0000)

> Oh the Rumble plays...

You might wanna have a look at Zztai's Fiora too. He is damn good at that champion.

can you rig this and tell me what you guys rigged it for :P
If I bet on them all, do I win the prize?

Well, like me think:

Loses all bets on other teams (11)
Wins bet on 1 team.
Profit = -$40

I don't think your even aloud to bet on LoL

EDG if they're performing at their best they're unstoppable

otherwise LGD's triple carry team is too strong

I'm hoping for LGD. GO IMP.
